title: Looking for a good blank tshirt resource
content:
Hello,   
   
I know this isn't directly type related but I am looking for a good blank T-shirt company that carries all of the colors in the rainbow in infant sizes. I have looked all over the place and all I can find are cheesy pastels. I am looking for some good rich bold colors. Anyone have an idea? Please contact me : [jeff@jeeto.com](mailto:jeff@jeeto.com).   
   
If I am able to work with a recommendation you have I will send you a canvas hot off the press from our company : [http://www.jeeto.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111341/http:/www.jeeto.com/). Ill sign it myself and make you all happy and stuff.   
   
Thanks in advance!
author: anonymous

comments.content: I used to use [Broder Bothers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111341/http:/www.broderbros.com/) when I did T-shirts. Always seemed reasonable to me...

Thanks so far. American Apparel is kilelr but they only have white for infants and i think some pastels. Broder brothers is cool and I dig the colors they have but still need a variety like orange and green. Maybe the best thing to do is get a dyer for the aa whites... keep em coming if you have something. Thanks!

Jeff, the [Typophile Tees](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111341/http:/typophile.com/needs/your/support/) are from [Murina](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111341/http:/www.murina.com/). We've   
been impressed with the quality of the color and   
the Beefy-like cotton.
